creator: ranvijay.singh@hsc.com
text:
When Release Note confirmation Dialog box is coming,Then click on YES/NO button, One Mouse Timer is coming and Chainsaw is hanged.
But When I installed Rosetta on MAC , this is working fine?
Why Rosetta is required for Chainsaw Logger?

creator: sdeboy@iname.com
text:
The latest developer snapshot of Chainsaw has the release notes popup removed.  the first line of the 'Welcome tab' directs people how to view the release notes.

You can get the latest snapshot here:

http://people.apache.org/~sdeboy
